xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content:
confluencepro.panel.title=Confluence Migrator Pro confluencepro.extension.name=Confluence Migrator Pro
confluencepro.extension.missingLicense=The application is running in trial mode. In order to unlock the full capabilities please obtain a license from the {0}administration section{1}.
confluencepro.zippicker.title=Select a confluence package to start the migration confluencepro.zippicker.placeholder=Pick a confluence export package... confluencepro.zippicker.button.submit=Migrate
confluencepro.norights=Only the admin can perform the migration. confluencepro.upload.submit=Upload new package confluencepro.upload.cancel=Cancel selection
confluencepro.packages.title=Step 2 - Choose a backup package confluencepro.migrations.title=Your migrations
confluencepro.prerequisites.title=Step 1 - Prerequisites confluencepro.prerequisites.hint=It is highly recommended to have all the prerequisites satisfied before proceeding with the migration. confluencepro.prerequisites.completed=completed confluencepro.prerequisites.incomplete=not completed confluencepro.prerequisites.memory=Set -Xmx ({0}) and -Xms ({1}) to at least half the memory of the machine ({2} for {3} RAM). confluencepro.prerequisites.notifications=Deactivate notifications in "xwiki.properties": "notifications.enabled" and "notifications.emails.enabled" (optional). confluencepro.prerequisites.userNotifications=Deactivate notifications on your own profile ("never" for automatic page watching, disable page notifications). confluencepro.prerequisites.userNotificationsCleanup=Clean the Notification Preferences (optional). confluencepro.prerequisites.solr=To minimize migration duration, we recommend to ensure that the Solr queue is empty before starting the migration. Check the Solr queue size in the Wiki Administration, Solr Search Section (optional). confluencepro.prerequisites.listener.docMoved=Deactivate Document Moved Listener (important for large spaces). confluencepro.prerequisites.listener.automaticWatch=Deactivate Automatic Watch Mode Listener (important for large spaces). confluencepro.prerequisites.listener.liveNotification=Deactivate Live Notification Email Listener (important for large spaces).
confluencepro.migration.raport.imported.success=Migration complete. See your report below. confluencepro.migration.raport.imported.title=The imported pages from the {0} selected Confluence Space(s). confluencepro.migration.raport.logs.title=The logs of the migration. confluencepro.migration.raport.viewall.button=View all migrations confluencepro.migration.raport.reset.button=Restart the migration confluencepro.migration.raport.reset.confirm=Are you sure you want to restart the migration? confluencepro.migration.raport.reset.fail=Failed to restart the migration confluencepro.migration.raport.reset.success=Restarting migration confluencepro.migration.raport.reset.progress=Sending request confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.skipped.title={0} page(s) have encountered critical issues during the import. confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.done.title={0} page(s) have encountered non-critical issues during the import. confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.other.title={0} other issue(s) were encountered during the import. confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.other.error=Encountered errors confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.other.warn=Encountered warnings
confluencepro.migration.title.label=Set the title of the migration confluencepro.migration.title.placeholder=Type the desired title... confluencepro.migration.missingLicense=As part of a trial, you can migrate one space per migration. In order to unlock the full capabilities please obtain a license.
confluencepro.migration.livetable.doc.title=Migration confluencepro.migration.livetable._actions=Actions confluencepro.migration.livetable._actions.select=Select package confluencepro.migration.livetable.job_status=Migration status confluencepro.migration.livetable.executed=Is executed? confluencepro.migration.livetable.doc.date=Creation date confluencepro.migration.livetable.doc.author=Creator confluencepro.migration.livetable.state.running=Running confluencepro.migration.livetable.state.none=Not started confluencepro.migration.livetable.state.waiting=Waiting confluencepro.migration.livetable.state.done=Done
confluencepro.migration.popup.title=Insert the title of the migration confluencepro.migration.popup.placeholder=Type the migration title... confluencepro.migration.popup.startMigration=Start migration
confluencepro.job.question.title=Select the Confluence spaces that you want to be imported. confluencepro.job.question.additionalInfo.documentsCount=Documents: confluencepro.job.question.additionalInfo.attachmentsCount=Attachments: confluencepro.job.question.selectAll=Select all confluencepro.job.question.search.placeholder=Search for a space... confluencepro.job.question.showMore.message={0} more spaces available. confluencepro.job.question.showMore.link=Load more.. confluencepro.job.status.readingPackage=Analysing the Confluence package. This may take a while.. confluencepro.job.status.runningJob=Your pages are being imported and moved into the correct location. This may take a while.. confluencepro.job.question.advanced.link=Advanced migration options confluencepro.job.question.advanced.input=Properties of the input filter stream (Confluence XML) confluencepro.job.question.advanced.output=Properties of the output filter stream (XWiki instance) confluencepro.job.onlyrights.title=Right-only Import confluencepro.job.onlyrights.description=If you have already migrated your content and wish to import Confluence rights without modifying the content, you can do so setting this option to "true". confluencepro.job.onlyrights.warning=If you set this field to true, options in the next section will be ignored (because the default instance output filter stream is replaced with a custom one). confluencepro.job.onlyrights.question.title=Only import rights confluencepro.job.onlyrights.question.hint=Only import rights, otherwise keeping the existing documents as they are.
